description: This file contains CSS styles for a theme-managed interface, with defined variables for both light and dark themes, styling for the App component, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with styles for text alignment, background color, and minimum height.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application styled for layout and responsive design.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application with animations defined under certain media queries.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with specific styles and transition effects.
